special_text:
Diverge [i](Pick only one path as a sorcery to gain that type and a +1/+1 counter.)[/i]
When Maghbri Votary enters and at the beginning of your upkeep, you may mill two cards.
{X}{W}: Zombie
Return up to two target creature cards with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
{3}{U}: Shaman
Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard.
